DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study look reduction oxygen level ( hypoxia ) influence insulin sensitivity carbohydrate metabolism . It expect 10 night exposure moderate hypoxia ( ~ 15 % O2 , similar condition altitude ~7500 foot ) improve glucose metabolism .
DOC.brief_title: Effect 10-day Overnight Hypoxia Treatment Whole Body Insulin Sensitivity ( SLEEP HIGH Study )
